properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Create or Update
options.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an item

options.name: Get
options.description: Get an item

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many items

properties.name: tableName
properties.description: Table to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: dataToSend
properties.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Define Below for Each Column
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

properties.name: inputsToIgnore
properties.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Only needed when the parameter "condition expression" is set.

options.name: eavUi
options.description: Substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Only needed when the parameter "condition expression" is set.

options.name: conditionExpression
options.description: A condition that must be satisfied in order for a conditional upsert to succeed. View details.

options.name: eanUi
options.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. View details.

properties.name: returnValues
properties.description: The content of the old item is returned

options.name: Attribute Values
options.description: The content of the old item is returned

options.name: Nothing
options.description: Nothing is returned

properties.name: keysUi
properties.description: Item's primary key. For example, with a simple primary key, you only need to provide a value for the partition key. For a composite primary key, you must provide values for both the partition key and the sort key.

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: A condition that must be satisfied in order for a conditional delete to succeed

options.name: conditionExpression
options.description: A condition that must be satisfied in order for a conditional delete to succeed

options.name: eanUi
options.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Check Info.

options.name: expressionAttributeUi
options.description: Substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Only needed when the parameter "condition expression" is set.

properties.name: select
properties.description: Select them in Attributes to Select under Additional Fields

options.name: Specific Attributes
options.description: Select them in Attributes to Select under Additional Fields

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: keysUi
properties.description: Item's primary key. For example, with a simple primary key, you only need to provide a value for the partition key. For a composite primary key, you must provide values for both the partition key and the sort key.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. View details.

options.name: eanUi
options.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. View details.

options.name: readType
options.description: Type of read to perform on the table. View details.

properties.name: scan
properties.description: Whether to do an scan or query. Check differences.

properties.name: filterExpression
properties.description: A filter expression determines which items within the Scan results should be returned to you. All of the other results are discarded. Empty value will return all Scan results.

properties.name: keyConditionExpression
properties.description: Condition to determine the items to be retrieved. The condition must perform an equality test on a single partition key value, in this format: partitionKeyName = :partitionkeyval

properties.name: eavUi
properties.description: Substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: select
properties.description: Select them in Attributes to Select under Additional Fields

options.name: Specific Attributes
options.description: Select them in Attributes to Select under Additional Fields

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: options
properties.description: Name of the index to query. It can be any secondary local or global index on the table.

options.name: indexName
options.description: Name of the index to query. It can be any secondary local or global index on the table.

options.name: projectionExpression
options.description: Text that identifies one or more attributes to retrieve from the table. These attributes can include scalars, sets, or elements of a JSON document. The attributes in the expression must be separated by commas.

options.name: filterExpression
options.description: Text that contains conditions that DynamoDB applies after the Query operation, but before the data is returned. Items that do not satisfy the FilterExpression criteria are not returned.

options.name: eanUi
options.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Check Info.

operations.name: Create or Update
operations.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

item.name: Create or Update
item.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

possibleValues.name: Create or Update
possibleValues.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

possibleValues.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
possibleValues.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

possibleValues.name: Define Below for Each Column
possibleValues.description: Set the value for each destination column

subProperties.name: eanUi
subProperties.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. View details.

subProperties.name: readType
subProperties.description: Type of read to perform on the table. View details.

possibleValues.name: Attribute Values
possibleValues.description: The content of the old item is returned

possibleValues.name: Specific Attributes
possibleValues.description: Select them in Attributes to Select under Additional Fields

subProperties.name: indexName
subProperties.description: Name of the index to query. It can be any secondary local or global index on the table.

subProperties.name: projectionExpression
subProperties.description: Text that identifies one or more attributes to retrieve from the table. These attributes can include scalars, sets, or elements of a JSON document. The attributes in the expression must be separated by commas.

subProperties.name: filterExpression
subProperties.description: Text that contains conditions that DynamoDB applies after the Query operation, but before the data is returned. Items that do not satisfy the FilterExpression criteria are not returned.

subProperties.name: eanUi
subProperties.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Check Info.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
